PFDI-20 Sample Dataset

Source: R/pfdi_data_minimal.R
pfdi_data_minimal.Rd

This is a sample dataset containing Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory (PFDI-20) responses along with patient identifiers and clinical measurements.

Usage

pfdi_data_minimal

Format

A data frame with observations on the following variables:

Record_ID

Unique patient identifier

PFDI.1

Usually experience pressure in the lower abdomen? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.2

Usually experience heaviness or dullness in the pelvic area? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.3

Usually have a bulge or something falling out? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.4

Usually have to push on vagina to have bowel movement? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.5

Usually experience incomplete bladder emptying? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.6

Ever have to push up on a bulge in the vaginal area? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.7

Feel need to strain hard for bowel movement? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.8

Feel incomplete bowel emptying? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.9

Usually lose stool beyond your control? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.10

Usually lose stool beyond control if stool is loose? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.11

Usually lose gas from the rectum beyond control? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.12

Usually have pain when passing stool? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.13

Experience strong urgency for bowel movement? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.14

Does part of your bowel ever pass through the rectum? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.15

Usually experience frequent urination? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.16

Usually experience urine leakage with urgency? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.17

Usually experience urine leakage with coughing/sneezing? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.18

Usually experience small amounts of urine leakage? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.19

Usually experience difficulty emptying bladder? (0-4 scale)

PFDI.20

Usually experience pain or discomfort in lower abdomen? (0-4 scale)

Age

Patient age in years

BMI

Body Mass Index

Source

This is a synthetic dataset created for demonstration purposes.
